title: Ethuvumae Thonala Song Lyrics Mapla Singam
stanzas: <div>Ethuvumae Thonala Song Lyrics Mapla Singam

ethuvume thonnale
enakku enna aachu mapla
oru mura nerula
ava kanna paatha thevala

manasula pookkala
ava nattaa pora pokkula
paravura kaathula
enna patta potta moochula

naan avala rasikka
azhaga viyakka
pasiyum varala

vaai mozhiya marakka
mudangi kidakka
pozhuthum ragala

ethuvume thonala
enakku enna aachu mapla
oru mura nerula
ava kanna paatha thevala

ava pokira vazhi pokala
ava veethiyil kudiyerala
irunthaalume ava niyabagam
ena neengala

ava mela naan kuriyaagala
ava pola naan thimiraagala
mudipodura ena koondhala
manam thaangala

ethana paaviga kooda ninnaalum
konnuduthe ava vaasana aala
kattida thaaliyum selaiyum vaanga
solliduren moramamana pola

pothuva pothuva
ava paarvai moolaiyila
methuva methuva
sarijene bothaiyila

naan avala rasikka
azhaga viyakka
pasiyum varala

vaai mozhiya marakka
mudangi kidakka
pozhuthum ragala
ethuvume thonnale..

avalaala naan thala seevala
ava veettula uravaadala
aniyaama ava perula pazhi podala

perusaga naan thadumarala
puthusaga naan pokazh paadala
iru kaalume avalaalathaan
nadamaadala

vakkanaiyaa ava jaadaiya paathu
vattamum poduthu vaaliba moola

sakkaraiyaa ava pesida kettu
vandhathu vaazhvena poguren mela

pothuva pothuva
ava pesi pogayila
methuva methuva
masinjene kaadhalula

naan avala rasikka
azhaga viyakka
pasiyum varala

vaai mozhiya marakka
mudangi kidakka
pozhuthum ragala
